name: ARCTIC HUNTER 15.6" Laptop Bag (Model Aura) Two Side Bottle Pocket, Waterproof, Multi-Function Pockets for Office College Men Women
Description:
Original Arctic Hunter Aura Laptop Backpack is a versatile accessory designed for modern professionals and students alike, offering a stylish and practical solution to carrying your laptop and other essentials  
 Made with high-quality materials, the backpack features a water-resistant and scratch-resistant outer that keeps your belongings safe and dry, even in the toughest of weather conditions  
 With multiple compartments, including a cushioned laptop compartment that is ideal for laptops up to 15.6 inches and a tablet compartment for devices up to 10.2 inches, the backpack provides ample space for all your daily essentials  
 The backpack is designed for maximum comfort, with cushioned and padded shoulder straps and back that ensure you can carry your belongings with ease, even during extended periods of use  
 Whether you need a reliable office bag or a durable backpack for college, the Arctic Hunter Aura Laptop Backpack is the perfect choice, offering a large storage capacity, anti-theft pockets, side bottle pockets, and an external USB port for added convenience
